video_title: Agents Unleashed Podcast Ep. 9 - Why AI Agents Need Web3 ft. David Attermann
description:
Welcome to Episode 10 of the Agents Unleashed Podcast â€” the show that helps you find signal in the noisy world of agentic AI. Hosted by Thomas Maybrier (Digital Media Producer, Valory), this episode dives into where Web3 AI is actually working with insights from guest David Attermann, Head of Web3 Investments at M31 Capital.

In This Episode:

David Attermann breaks down why verifiable privacy, composability, and on-chain autonomy are more than buzzwords: theyâ€™re essential components of real AI agents. He shares the investor's lens on whatâ€™s working, where real-world use cases are gaining traction, areas where Web2 adoption of crypto infrastructure is already underway.

We also explore:

- Why most AI agents aren't truly autonomous (yet)
- The role of trusted execution environments (TEEs)
- The evolution from speculative hype to practical, composable AI systems
- Web3â€™s unique edge in secure, economically-incentivized AI

Chapters

00:00 Introduction
02:00 Davidâ€™s background in Web2 infrastructure and AI
02:45 His shift from traditional finance to blockchain
03:30 The advantages David saw in Web3 and how they've changed over time
09:23 Why the most useful AI agents must be autonomous
13:40 Incentive design as a strength of Web3
16:40 Where David finds AI most useful
18:45 Promising potential - where AI isn't meeting expectations (yet)
22:27 How AI agents could help us with our blind spots
25:00 On the "developers are dead" narrative
26:18 The 30k foot view: An investor's perspective on AI 
32:55 Stronger together: a call to action for AI and Web3 teams

Agents Unleashed: Cannes â€” June 30, 2025
The event is free, but space is limited.
RSVP here: https://lu.ma/tp6rhykz

Resources & Links:

David Attermann at M31 Capital: https://m31.ventures/
David on X: @atterX_ 

Sponsored by Olas â€” the best way to own and monetize your AI agents. Learn more at https://www.olas.network

ðŸŽµ Theme music: "Forward" by Grand Project on Pixabay: https://pixabay.com/users/grand_project-19033897/

ðŸ’¬ Like, subscribe, and leave a comment! 
Follow Thomas on X: @ThomasMaybrier
Run your own AI agent today â†’ https://olas.network
